data.title: Magnificent century

Mera Asher is the favorite of Shehzade Suleiman and the mother of his two sons and daughter. Once Sultan Selim dies, and Suleiman ascends, she moves with her children to Topkapi palace, where new harem intrigues await her. Mera will do everything she can to protect her children, even if it means spilling royal blood. ...

" A woman fits in many roles in her lifetime. She's someone else at each stage of her life. She is a child, a woman, a mother. If she's smart and blessed subject of God she could even become a Sultana. What matters is which title and role you see fit for yourself. "

Pink Blossom || Valide Filiz Sultan

(Credits to Queenie989 on Pinterest for the cover!) Floryn is sold to the Ottomans, and Valide Afife Sultan decides to purchase her. The Sultan is intrigued by her, and Floryn becomes the favourite in no time.

THE KHAN'S WIFE

Neslihan Sultan was born as daughter of Sultan Mahmud and Hibetullah Sultan. She enjoyed her easy life with her parents and siblings in Topkapi palace, all until her 18th birthday when her father suddenly died. It was a surprise to everyone especially to her who was her father's favourite child. Since there was no rul...

THE ROYAL BLOOD | MAGNIFICENT CENTURY

Safiye Sultan was daughter of Sultan Selim Khan and his consort Gulbahar Hatun. Being the only child which wasn't of the same mother Hafsa Sultan, she felt unwanted at the court when Suleiman's reign started. She was very quickly married off into a marriage which was everything but successful. She decided she won't al...

THE UNFORTUNATE SULTANA | MAGNIFICENT CENTURY

Fatma is daughter of Sultan Ahmed Khan and Gulbahar Sultan. She was born as twin sister of Sehzade Bayezid, but her father died when she was only five years old. Her mother was banished and she had to spent her life in the Palace which was ruled by her step-mother Kosem Sultan. Fatma never received enough of attention...

Forbidden Love

Hierren sulan is the 3rd child of Hurrem Sultan and Sultan Suleiman. Her life has been good all this time but there was one thing that she couldn't forgive herself for doing...she was in love with her brother Prince Mustafa

Life as an Ottoman Sultana was hard because you have to play the game of thrones to survive.
